Half Life 2 is the awesome following part to the first part of Half Life. The waiting for this Game was worth. Its the best Game on its releasing Year and still was. 

Unless like in the first part of this Game, you are not fighting the Aliens, no, you are leading a Human Revolution against the called Combine and its Head. So yes, Gordon Freeman becomes the ruler, the savior about the Mankind, wich is drowning under the Fate of the Combine Corporation, wich is almost slaving the Mankind. The Story became just totally different but hell yeah, Gordon Freeman is now a Celebraty, because everybody on the Street knows him and want to help him on his way.

On this Game, the Graphics are just awesome. The Source Engine was totally successfull and one of the best. The Physics are great, more features, you can drive a Vehicle (oh srsly, its awesome) you can ride over the Seas (Awesome too) and the best of all, more Gordon Freeman.

целесообразно была удостоена награды 'Лучшая игра десятилетия' на конференции Spike VGA. Главный герой игры - Гордон Фримен - физик-теоретик, который, как мы знаем из событий Half-Life, положил начало такому событию, как "Каскадный резонанс", но лишь косвенно (Кристалл, породивший данное явление, был передан герою G-Man'ом, самым загадочным персонажем игровой серии). Сюжет игры гениален, запутан, увлекателен и полон загадок. В самом начале игрок прибывает в Сити-17, город, который захвачен межпланетной цивилизацией "Альянс", и по мере прохождения вам придется бежать оттуда. С боем. Вы встретите многих героев из прошлой части игры, таких как Барни Калхун, Илай Вэнс, Айзек Кляйнер... В игре нет необходимости носить только два-три вида оружия - весь используемый в игре арсенал можно одновременно хранить у себя и доставать необходимое в любой момент. Монтировка, пистолет, револьвер, дробовик, два варианта автомата, управляемая ракетница, гранаты и даже арбалет! Также в качестве оружия можно использовать грави-пушку, но она больше подходит для манипуляций с предметами а-ля бочки, ящики, двери и стальные пластины. Сам игровой сюжет растянут на 13 глав. Каждая из них проходится не быстро, а иногда и таит в себе головоломки, сюжетные повороты, красочные боевые действия. Half-Life 2 затянет вас и вы будете проходить ее не отрываясь, а также горя желанием узнать, что же случится ПОСЛЕ прохождения игры... Но это вы уже узнаете, когда начнете играть в Half-Life 2 : Episode One и Half-Life 2: Episode Two. 
Оценки по критериям: 
Сюжет - 10/10
Графика - 10/10 - игра использует новейший для 2004-го года движок 'Source', предоставляющий игроку шикарные анимации, красивую графику, высококачественные шейдеры и многое другое.
Звук - 10/10 - эффекты и музыка в каждом уровне на высоте!
Геймплей - 10/10 - простой и понятный интерфейс, нет никаких заморочек с управлением и ориентацией в игре.

What can I say? It's great. Wish the story was a little longer, but it still took me about 11 hours to beat it. Buy the Half-Life package (i got the orange box) that way you save money and get the other parts to the game, like Episode 1 and Episode 2

Posiblemente el mejor FPS de la historia. Cuando tuve mi primer PC, el primer juego que me regalaron fue el Half-Life 1 y lo disfrute de sobremanera, me parecio un juego increiblemente divertido, ya que con 12 años no me fijaba en otros apartados.
Años mas tarde cuando salio Half-Life 2 mi PC ya estaba un pelin anticuado para el y no fue hasta el año 2013 cuando me puse una cuenta de Steam en mi flamante nuevo sobremesa y me hice con el juego y sus dos episodios.  
A dia de hoy he jugado 2 veces cada uno de ellos y estoy seguro que en el futuro los volvere a jugar.
Half-Life 2 es uno de esos juegos que entra en la categoria de videojuegos perfectos. 
No tiene fallos, por lo menos desde mi punto de vista, su narrativa es como deberia ser en un videojuego, siempre desde el punto de vista del avatar y dando al jugador la opción de elegir que quiere saber de la trama, asi los jugadores mas pacientes se enriqueceran mas de la gran historia que esconde este shooter.
En cuanto a jugabilidad, este es el jugego con las mejores escenas de disparos que he tenido el placer de jugar. Cada tiroteo es como estar dentro de una escena de acción de Michael Mann. Ademas aqui cada arma si es diferente de las demas y el uso de la pistola de gravedad es simplemente maravilloso. 
Los puzzles, los escenarios, los planteamientos....todo es perfecto en este videojuego. 
En definitiva, si no tienes Half-Life 2, compralo. Si no lo tienes por que no te gustan los FPS, compralo. Y aunque no te gusten los videojuegos, compralo. 
Para despedirme solo hacer una de las miles de peticiones hacia Valve. Por favor... ¡¡¡haced HALF-LIFE 3!!!
The follower to one of the all-time FPS classics, combined with new engine, makes one of the best games in modern history. You should play this. Period.

Half-Life 2 is a game from 2005 that helped set the standard for FPS shooters which could and would follow it. The original Half-Life was, at the time, critically aclaimmed, and got some attention for its unique playstyle. Then Valve made a second one.
And it BLEW OUR BALLS OFF.

Highly addicting, long and filled with story and action, and although from 2005, still stands as one of the greatest games of all time.

The graphics are well optomized for the limiatations of most systems at the time of development, and the game's engine is still used to develop new games for Valve to this very day.

Overall, a must have, go get the orange box, don't buy it seperately, you get more game from the orange box.
I mean, c'mon.

This is a great game. The physics and graphics are superb in comparison to the original Half Life, impressing me even 10 years after the release date. The game is about as long as Half Life 1 and features many elements in common, e.g. the HEV suit, the crowbar and the headcrabs; however, I feel that this is fundamentally a different style of game. The environment is more open, the physics engine changes the gameplay and the atmosphere is less quaint, more dystopian.

Fans of 1984 will enjoy the setting; the gameplay is plain good and should entertain all FPS fans.

This is an amazing game, and pretty much perfect from a gameplay standpoint. As a fan of story and character in games, though, I prefer the two 'episodes' following this as I think they handled that aspect better there. This is because, in this game, you're on your own for the most part, but in the two 'episodes' after this you're frequently paired with another character and they flesh out the world a lot. Also, the story, while entertaining and mostly satisfying, is pretty vague and I would love to understand what's really going on someday. Maybe, when the fabled Half Life 3 comes out, we'll all understand.

Half-Life 2 lives up to its name by providing an endearing story with likable characters and an overlooming threat that our favourite silent hero from the first HL game, Gordon Freeman, must rise up and defeat. It remains entertaining even all the way through to Episode 1 and 2, contains unique weapons, great graphics that stand out even today, and an excellent game engine that is still being used by Valve and indie game devs in this day and age. 

While there are some weapons that just don't feel right in this game whether it's how they feel when firing them or simply holding them and the game has a bad habit of repeating itself in certain instances, I felt HL2 is an excellent game that got's flaws, but that can forgiven for what it delivers in its 15-hour journey.

What can be said about this game that hasn't already been said?  It's a classic that stands the test of time.

A vestibule of nostalgia for sure. For a game released in 2004, the graphics and mechanics hold up well. The story is amazing, the visuals are stunning, and it stars the legendary, silent physicist we all love: Gordon Freeman. Although the Combine and its technology are interesting and quite advanced for a game set in the 2020s, this game is a captivating sci fi shooter that has a nice arsenal of weapons at the player's disposal. The physics are great and fun to mess with. The soundtrack is great and the sound design works its way well as it gives a feeling to Half-Life 2's destitute environment based in Eastern Europe. A personal favorite of mine, Half-Life 2 is a classic and a milestone in FPS history. Since it is easy to acquire through Steam sales or Valve related events, Half-Life 2 should have a place in anyone's library.

Küçükken oynardım oyun cidden harika. Valve'nin neden HL3 çıkarmadığını bilmiyorum ama Half Life 2 harika. HL1 ile aynı fiyata sahip olması da güzel. Eski bir oyun ama grafikler şahane. Alınabilir bi oyun.

Herkesin oynaması gereken bi oyun. Kurgusu inanılmaz. HL1'i oynamış ya da oynamamış her yaştan insan bu oyunu oynamalı ciddiyim kesinlikle alın eğer param yok derseniz gidin internette torrent var ya da crack mutlaka napın edin de şu oyunu oynayın kelimeler kifayetsiz kalıyor.
